title: Turkey
description: Turkey is a country with a rich cultural heritage. This peninsula country joins the continents of Asia and Europe together. Turkeys customs, culture, landscape, and more are on display in this title for fluent readers. Special features introduce readers to the countrys language, climate, and landscape, while engaging activities highlight Turkish recipes and activities. Readers will enjoy this thorough exploration of all that makes Turkey great!
author: Golriz Golkar
